products.tagline: Incredible viewing and amazing sound – all in a super-slim, ultra-light tablet
products.description: At only 6.4 mm and from 426 g, it is the world’s slimmest and lightest waterproof tablet. Its dust- and scratch-resistant display, and entirely waterproof body is designed to handle every aspect of your life.

specification.label: Camera and video
specification.val: Rear - Exmor RS, 8.1M Pixels; Front - Exmor R, 2.2M Pixels

specification.label: Display
specification.val: IPS with Triluminos™ and X-Reality™ for Mobile WUXGA 1920 x 1200

specification.label: Battery
specification.val: Lithium Polymer; Music listening time up to 200 hours; Video playback up to 13 hours

products.tagline: Xperia™ Tablet Z - experience the best of Sony in a Tablet
products.description: A sharper, faster, more colourful tablet. The latest Sony HD Reality Display technology ensures the most vivid viewing imaginable. This go-anywhere tablet is slim, light and portable, but super-strong glass and a water-resistant construction make it anything but fragile. Powered by a Snapdragon S4 Pro processor for super-speed, crystal clear sound and an impresive battery life.

specification.label: Camera and video
specification.val: Rear - 8.1 MP with Exmor R for mobile and AF/Macro; Front - 2.2 MP with Exmor R for mobile

specification.label: Display
specification.val: TFT Colour LCD5 10.1 inch touchscreen with Mobile BRAVIA™ Engine 2; WUXGA 1920 x 1200; Anti-fingerprint; LED Backlight

specification.label: Battery
specification.val: Lithium Polymer; Charging time 6.5 hours; Music listening time up to 100 hours; Video playback up to 9 hours 50 mins
